message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a truly unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $750000? I believe this would still reflect the value of the item while allowing me to make a purchase.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $800000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value and rarity.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'll consider your offer, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $775000? This would allow us to come closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to work together to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $775000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $790000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and rarity.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I'm glad we're making progress. I'll propose $785000 as a final offer. This price reflects the value of the product while keeping it within my budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
